meta_data.value:
Begin your voyage of Ayurveda discovery with this trio of intense pacifying formulae blended with powerful Ayurveda herbs & potent essential oils to promote dreamy restful sleep. Comforting & grounding Neroli Blossom helps take away daily stress & gently unwind, while exotic Ylang Ylang calms & clarifies mind & body. The finest oriental Lavender helps soothe the senses, promoting tranquil calm & restful sleep. Zesty Orange helps balance the chakras. The natural synergy helps relax, unwind & drift away.
This includes, Sleep Intense - Relaxing Body Cleanser - 30ml Sleep Intense - Dream Essence Mist - 20ml Sleep Intense - Dream Balm - 8g

name: Neroli Jasmine - No Age - Serum Enriched Hand Cream - 30g
short_description: An easy-absorbent blend of rich fruit butters & Ayurveda WonderHerbs for intensive care.

meta_data.value: Apply & gently massage into hands after every time hands are washed. Overnight treatment: at bedtime, apply generously & leave on.
WonderHerbs sustainably sourced from our island home

An easy-absorbent blend of rich fruit butters & Ayurveda WonderHerbs for intensive care. Naturally vitamin-rich Wheatgerm, Sweet Almond & Virgin Coconut combine with Mango & Kokum Butters to help nourish, soften & smoothen rough hands, protecting against dryness. 

Rice Bran, Grape, Licorice & Green Tea help promote more even-toned, brighter & younger looking hands & nails. Calming Neroli Blossom, uplifting Orange & refreshing Bergamot work in synergy with balancing Jasmine to soothe & calm the senses.
WonderHerbs sustainably sourced from our island home

name: Fruit Paradise - 24 Days Wellness & Beauty Calendar
short_description:
This season our celebration collections are adorned with a range of colourful tropical fruits from Ceylon. Each uniquely decorated in our signature floral artistry, inspired by traditional motifs from the grand Royal palaces of ancient Ceylon.

Fruit Paradise – 24 Days Wellness & Beauty Calendar includes 24 products valued over Rs.33,000 only for Rs.16,500 (*Limited Time Online Offer)

meta_data.value:
The romance of old Ceylon, combined with ancient Ayurveda wisdom, captured in a pampering range of majestic Royal spa formulae & Royal spa rituals, to soothe, calm & relax your body, mind & soul.

These vibrant, tropical fruits have been entwined in Sri Lankan culture, lifestyle & wellness practices for centuries. Their natural bounty was an intrinsic part of traditional Ayurveda for their nourishing, healing & balancing properties. Their refreshing aromas & vibrant colours would adorn the living spaces of the Ceylonese from homes to grand palaces, while also being inspiration for a myriad of arts & crafts created in the island.

Every time you choose a product from these collections, you help us donate a percentage of the sale price towards the preservation of the islands precious eco-system & also towards promoting sustainable cultivation of fruits & herbs in the country.

1)	Anti-Pollution Gel Facial Masque - True Turmeric - Vitamin C Glow - 25g

2)	Bath & Shower Gel Gentle Body Cleanser - Neroli Jasmine - 50ml

3)	Body & Pillow Mist - 20ml

4)	Eau de Ceylon - Mandarin Spice - 30ml

5)	Eau de Perfume - 10ml

6)	Facial Cleansing Foam - Sal & Saffron - Vitamin E Rich - 25g

7)	Hair Treatment Masque - Virgin Coconut - 25g

8)	Hydrating Butter - Sleep - 30g

9)	Intensive Hand Cream - 10g

10)	Lip Balm - 8g

11)	Luxury Soap - Neroli Jasmine - 50g

12)	Natural Butter - Wild Mangosteen - 25g

13)	Night Body Lotion - White Jasmine - 50ml

14)	Nourishing All-Day Protector - White Rice - 10g

15)	Nourishing Hair Conditioner - Kesharaja - 50ml

16)	Perfumed Body Spray - Bentota - 30ml

17)	Perfumed Body Spray - Frangipani Paradise - 30ml

18)	Rich Body Butter - White Jasmine - 30g

19)	Age Refining Nourishing Facial Cream - Skin-Smooth - Bakuchiol - 10g

20)	Summer Wellness Head To Toe Ultra-Hydrating Gel - Aloe Lemongrass Mandarin - 30ml

21)	Tinted Lip Balm - 4g

22)	Dream Balm - Sleep Intense - 10g

23)	Wellness Soap - Red Sandal & Cinnamon - 50g

A luxurious blissful floral bouquet of Oriental Tuberose twinned with whispers of Ceylonese Jasmine, indulging you in a sensual escape to the Royal Floral Gardens of old Ceylon.
Combines notes of Ceylon Citroen, Ceylon Naarang & Mountain Berries, with a heart of Orange Blossom, Ceylon Jasmine & Tuberose, leading to a base of Amber, Musk, Cedar & Ceylon Vanilla. Blended with a combination of exotic aromatic essential oils of Oriental Tuberose & Jasmine.

name: Youth Preserve Boosters (Copy)
short_description: Targeted Deep Hydration and Nourishment to Reverse Signs of Aging.

meta_data.value:
A fast-action extra-potent wonder blend infused with nourishing Sal Butter & precious Saffron to instantly deep-hydrate, soothe dryness, minimise appearance of pores & add a more visibly youthful glow to skin. Powerful four-dimensional Hyaluronic Acid combines with ultra-nourishing Vitamin E & Virgin Coconut, to help deep-hydrate & instantly boost skin, adding softer, smoother, more refreshed look.
Red Sandal, Calumbawood, Watercress, Licorice & Bearberry helps take away dullness & promote skin wellness. Super-charged with Saffron infused traditional Kumkumadi Treatment Oil to help revitalise skin & promote a brighter natural glow.
Sal & Saffron  Vitamin E Rich  Ultra-Hydrating Facial Treatment Gel  60ml

A powerful targeted treatment infused with nourishing Sal Butter & precious Saffron to help soothe & protect skin around & under the eyes, defending against visible signs of skin ageing. Red Sandal, Calumbawood, Rice Bran & Almond help minimise discolourations & dullness.
